ISSUE.TITLE: Wrong navigation link when click on Open Collective Profile item
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: # Bug report - [x] I confirm this is a bug with Supabase, not with my own application. - [x] I confirm I have searched the [Docs](https://docs.supabase.com), GitHub [Discussions](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/discussions), and [Discord](https://discord.supabase.com). ## Describe the bug Wrong navigation link when click on Open Collective Profile item ## To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior, please provide code snippets or a repository: 1. Go to https://supabase.com/open-source 2. In Sponsored Project section, click on Open Collective Profile item 3. The browser open new tab with https://github.com/PostgREST/postgrest ## Expected behavior It should open open collective profile url of Supabase ## Screenshots ## System information - OS: macOS - Browser (if applies) chrome

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: Fix the loading state on the Continue with Github button (#17959) Use the loading state on the continue with github button on sign-in.
